content:
Certificate expired today (or perhaps yesterday). If you already got this far, you already know that. I texted @Wayne Kubick this morning, and he's responded, so hopefully this gets fixed soon. Tagging
@Grahame Grieve and @Lloyd McKenzie in case this is something they know how to fix.
Or is it a @David Johnson thing maybe?
Thanks for the call out, we're all set back up.
The folks at Zulip do a fine job hosting this for us, there was a little miss with chat.hl7.org moving into chat.fhir.org caused this one-time non-renewal for the LetsEncrypt certificates.
They got us allset and we're back on line. Also, @Keith Boone and @Ren√© Spronk Thank you for getting it to my attention that I could get the ball rolling.
